physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At 3 years and 7 months: Height 62.4 cm (-9.53 SDS), weight 5.15 kg (-9.36 SDS), microcephaly 43 cm (-4.8 SDS). Definitive craniofacial features included a high forehead with ocular proptosis, prominent beaked nose, micrognathia, small mouth with multiple dental caries, brachymesophalangy, arthrogryposis of the hands, equinus right foot. Generalized hypotonia, resistance to dorsiflexion of the right lower limb. Brisk and asymmetrical patellar osteotendinous reflexes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Liver function tests initially showed elevation of transaminases that progressively improved until normalization at 6 years of age. MRI at age 8 showed changes including multiple aneurysms and occlusion of cerebral arteries.
